{"id":327992,"__entity_role__":null,"__entity_type__":"org_evidence","__permissions__":["org_evidence:remind","org_evidence:mark_sensitive","org_evidence:comment","org_evidence:upgrade","org_evidence:mark_reviewed","org_evidence:observation","org_evidence:create_subtask","org_evidence:master_evidence_diff","org_evidence:add","org_evidence:manage_acl","org_evidence:view_details","org_evidence:manage_tags","org_evidence:assign","org_evidence:edit","org_evidence:create_jira_issue","org_evidence:delete","org_evidence:deadline"],"created":"2021-12-17T14:42:01.070790Z","name":"Access Control / Registration and De-registration Process Document","description":"Provide user registration and de-registration process document/Access Control policy or procedure reviewed by management.","guidance":"","ad_hoc":false,"last_collected":"2024-04-03","collection_interval":"year","due_days_before_end":0,"master_version_num":5,"sensitive":false,"org_id":999999,"completed":true,"master_evidence_id":550,"master_content":{"id":550,"guidance":"**For NIST 800-53**
The documented access control policies and procedures should demonstrate that:
i) Accounts are created, enabled, modified, disabled, and removed in accordance with the organization's access control policy, procedures, prerequisites and criteria (as defined in the access control procedures).
ii) The organization has implemented a process for changing shared or group account authenticators when individuals are removed from the group.
iii) Account management processes are aligned with personnel termination and transfer processes."},"org_scopes":[{"org_id":999999,"created":"2021-12-14T20:44:56.288054Z","updated":"2021-12-14T20:44:56.288079Z","name":"Common Scope","description":"","scope_type":"global","acronym":"CS","id":777778,"__entity_type__":"org_scope","__permissions__":["org_scope:update","org_scope:manage_tags"]}],"tags":[],"open_incident_count":0,"jira_issues":[],"assignees":[{"first_name":"Test","last_name":"User","has_reviewed_name":true,"is_owner":true,"created":"2022-01-09T21:25:23.859312Z","updated":"2025-01-09T05:00:00.600811Z","suspended":false,"training_completed":null,"training_expiry_date":"2026-01-09","display_name":"Test User","short_display_name":"TU","pendo_enabled":true,"org_id":999999,"org":999999,"user_id":888888,"attachment_id":null,"org_role_id":3,"id":888888,"__entity_type__":"organization_member","attachment":null}],"supported_integrations":[],"aec_status":"na","subtask_count":0,"are_subtasks_reviewed":null,"has_automated_subtasks":null,"last_reminded_at":null,"supported_internal_aec":null}
